directions: Combine kale, beans, carrots, and cabbage in a large bowl.
Whisk together tahini, balsamic vinegar, water, and steak seasoning in a cup until smooth. Drizzle dressing over salad and sprinkle with pistachios.
ingredients: 3 ounces great Northern beans, drained and rinsed
title: Kale Salad with Vegetables and Tahini Dressing
